entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
